title: Ep 382 | Jase Accidentally Kills Off a Local Service & How Phil Repels Black Widows
description:
Jase inadvertently destroys a service that's been a fixture of his community for years, and now he has the Emergency Alert System in his crosshairs. "God’s Not Dead" director Harold Cronk joins the guys to talk about his new children's book, "The Beard Ballad." Phil shares the secret to his all-natural spider repellent. Al gets roasted for his love of vests, and he dishes it right back. And Jase and Al discuss the temple tax and what a fisherman would do if he found a coin in the mouth of a fish today.

https://beardballad.com — Get this inspiring new kids' book about boys & their dads with a foreword by Phil Robertson!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
